remarks:
Specialization: if a formula is true for all sets, it is true for any class which is a set.  Similar to Theorem 6.11 of [Quine] p. 44.  This is Frege's ninth axiom per Proposition 58 of [Frege1879] p. 51.  See also ~ stdpc4 and ~ rspsbc .  (Contributed by NM, 16-Jan-2004.) 

---

 Specialization: if a formula is true for all sets, it is true for any class which is a set.  Similar to Theorem 6.11 of [Quine] p. 44.  See also ~ stdpc4 and ~ rspsbc .  (Contributed by NM, 16-Jan-2004.)
statement: spsbc $p |- ( A e. V -> ( A. x ph -> [. A / x ]. ph ) ) $.
